procedureCodes.description: Functional Endoscopic Sinus Surgery, total ethmoidectomy; bilateral

evidence.description: Bilateral FESS performed for chronic rhinosinusitis with polyps.
evidence.excerpt: Functional Endoscopic Sinus Surgery (FESS), including: a. Bilateral total ethmoidectomy b. Right maxillary antrostomy c. Left frontal sinusotomy d. Bilateral nasal polypectomy
Placement of absorbable nasal packing (MeroGel, 2 units, 1 per side)
Chronic rhinosinusitis with nasal polyps, bilateral (ICD-10 J32.4, J33.0)
Chronic rhinosinusitis with nasal polyps, bilateral (ICD-10 J32.4, J33.0)

evidence.description: Assistant surgeon (resident) participated in the procedure.
evidence.excerpt: Dr. Kim (resident) participated under direct supervision for the entirety of the procedure, including all critical steps.

complianceIssues.description: FESS requires documentation of failed maximal medical therapy.
complianceIssues.violationDetails: LCD Policy L12345 requires documentation of at least 3 months of failed maximal medical therapy for FESS.
